solution_line_template: He has already done {total_so_far} this week because {sunday} + {monday} + {wednesday} + {thursday} + {friday} = <<{sunday}+{monday}+{wednesday}+{thursday}+{friday}={total_so_far}>>{total_so_far}.
If he does {to_tie} he will have done as many as last week because {last_week_total} - {total_so_far} = <<{to_tie}={to_tie}>>{to_tie}
He has to do {to_beat} on Saturday because {to_tie} + {one_more} = <<{to_tie}+{one_more}={to_beat}>>{to_beat}
